title: Brake Actuation Command Interface Module
description: Implement a software module that constructs and formats brake actuation commands for both PWM and CAN-based brake modulators. The logic must conform to ESC brake control interface specifications.

title: Engine Torque Reduction CAN Interface
description: Implement a CAN messaging interface that encodes and sends torque reduction requests to the engine ECU, including all message identifiers and payload structure required by the ESC system.

title: ESC CAN Messaging Stack
description: Develop the CAN bus messaging logic to transmit ESC system status and receive external control messages. Include implementation of error detection, timing supervision, and message prioritization logic.
